resources.string: "An identified user logged in for the first time. A new profile was created on App ID. Now when they log in with the same credentials from any device or web client, the app will show his same profile and selections."
"A known identified user logged in again. Their profile is fetched from App ID.
"A guest user started using the app. App ID created a new anonymous profile, where the user's selections can be stored. Note that this anonymous profile is only available from this device."
"A guest user returned. The app uses their existing anonymous profile, so their previous selections are shown. Note that this anonymous user profile is only available from this device."
"An identified user returned to the app with the same identity. The app accesses their identified profile and the previous selections that they made."
"The user signed back into the device with a different identity (e.g. was with Facebook, now with Google). The profile related to the identity they currently logged in with is now shown."

"A guest user logged-in for the first time. App ID assigned this user's identity to their anonymous profile, so their previous selections are saved. The anonymous token previously used to access this profile is now invalid."

"A user started to use the app anonymously, made some selections, and then logged in. Since they had logged in earlier, the app switches over to their existing identified profile in place of their anonymous profile."
Service Connection from AccessoryConsumer has been accepted by AccessoryProvider.
Service Connection from MessageConsumer has been accepted by MessageProvider.
Service Connection with AccessoryConsumer has been terminated.
Service Connection with MessageConsumer has been terminated.
